text: Mohammad Azam (born 23 October 1980) is an Emirati cricketer. He is a Left- hand batsman and Left-arm orthodox bowler. He made First class debut against Ireland in ICC Intercontinental Cup in 2013 He made his List A debut against Ireland in ICC World Cricket League in 2013 He made T20 debut against Ireland on 21 March 2013. On 11 August 2013 he played a match winning knock against Canada in T20. ==External links== * ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Emirati cricketers
title: Mohammad Azam
